item.title: Kits, Bills of Materials, and Components - Oh, the Possibilities!
item.description: When examining the core functions of Kits and Bills of Materials (BOMs) in Dynamics GP, the differences appear straightforward: Kits combine items at the point of sale, while BOMs group items during the production of a finished good. Essentially, Kits are sales-focused, while BOMs are inventory-focused. Kits are assembled upon sale, whereas BOMs are created before the item is even available for sale. While this seems simple, deciding between Kits and BOMs often sparks debate, even among experienced professionals.
